effect.shortEffect: Halves Attack and Special Attack at 50% max HP or less.
effect.full: This Pokémon's Attack and Special Attack are halved when it has half its HP or less.

description.black-white: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.
description.black-2-white-2: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.
description.x-y: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.
description.sun-moon: Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
description.sword-shield: Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
